The free breakfast was also quite good.

7 nights in Lviv staying at the Hotel George. It is amazing. Incredibly helpful, friendly staff who go out of their way to ensure our stay is comfortable. Location is the best! This is the first time I've ever written a review of a place because I so enjoyed my time here.
